questions.quote: Well, that interests me very much Mr. Farkus.Very much indeed, sir.

Because he'll know I told you. Besides, he's giving me a parking spot around the corner for practically nothing.
No no no, don't interrupt the cycle. The machine is working, it, it knows what it's doing. Just let it finish.
Say, I happened to catch you coming out of Schindler's List the other night.
Oh, man... "If the engine begins to overheat, turn off air conditioner". Never, I can't do that.
Then afterwards maybe we could all go out together. Y'know she'll see me with my friends, she'll observe me as I really am, as myself. Maybe I can get some hand that way.
